metadata.inclusion:
- Enter the Z-Wave Portal
- From the menu choose DEVICES and then + ADD DEVICE
- Now start the inclusion procedure of your Z-Wave device according to its manual
metadata.exclusion:
- Enter the Z-Wave Portal
- Choose MORE, then MAINTANACE and then REMOVE DEVICE
- Now start the removing procedure of your Z-Wave device according to its manual
metadata.reset:
- Enter the Z-Wave Portal
- Tab on MORE, then MAINTANACE and then RESET
- Confirm Reset by choosing CONFIRM and after couple of seconds the Reset is finished
